    Question - Class in application
    The Question class stores metadata and content for a user-submitted question.

    Questions - Class in application
    The Questions class handles the storage, retrieval, and modification of question data in both the database and local memory.
    Questions(Connection) - Constructor for class application.Questions
    Constructs a Questions manager instance.
